title: Andor Star Hopes Mon Mothma’s ‘Death of Truth’ Speech Resonates During Today’s Times
description: “The distance between what is said, and what is known to be true, has become an abyss.” You don’t say. This week on Disney+’s Andor, Season 2’s ninth episode revolved around Senator Mon Mothma (played by franchise vet Genevieve O’Reilly) doing her best to open the Imperial Senate’s eyes to the catastrophes unfolding on Ghorman. […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich
